name: expr-tree
description: An expression tree system for node.js. This library provides methods to parse Reverse Polish Notation (RPN) and useful functions to analyse and work with expression trees.

scripts.browserify: browserify exports.js > expr-tree.js && uglifyjs expr-tree.js > expr-tree.min.js

author: Matthieu 'Freeman' Vienot <me@ilambda.io> (http://blog.ilambda.me/)
